com.datastax.oss.dsbulk.mapping

Interface Mapping

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMapping

    public interface Mapping
    Defines a bidirectional, many-to-many relationship between record fields and CQL columns.

    In write workflows, CQL words correspond to bound variables in the write statement. In read workflows, CQL words correspond to row variables in a read result.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the codec to use for the given bound statement or row variable.
      Set<Field> fields()
      Returns all the fields in this mapping.
      Set<CQLWord> fieldToVariables(Field field)
      Maps the given field to one or more variables in a write bound statement.
      Set<CQLWord> variables()
      Returns all the variables in this mapping.
      Set<Field> variableToFields(CQLWord variable)
      Maps the given row variable to one or more fields in a record.

    • Method Detail

      • fieldToVariables

        @NonNull
Set<CQLWord> fieldToVariables(@NonNull
                                       Field field)
        Maps the given field to one or more variables in a write bound statement.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to find the variable for.
        Returns:
        the bound statement variables the given field maps to, or an empty collection if the field does not map to any known bound statement variable.

      • variableToFields

        @NonNull
Set<Field> variableToFields(@NonNull
                                     CQLWord variable)
        Maps the given row variable to one or more fields in a record.
        Parameters:
        variable - the row variable; never null.
        Returns:
        the fields the given variable maps to, or an empty collection if the variable does not map to any known field.

      • codec

        @NonNull
<T> TypeCodec<T> codec(@NonNull
                                CQLWord variable,
                                @NonNull
                                DataType cqlType,
                                @NonNull
                                GenericType<? extends T> javaType)
                         throws CodecNotFoundException
        Returns the codec to use for the given bound statement or row variable.

        Note that the given variable name must be supplied unquoted, even if it requires quoting to comply with the syntax of CQL identifiers.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the codec's Java type.
        Parameters:
        variable - the bound statement or row variable; never null.
        cqlType - the CQL type; never null.
        javaType - the Java type; never null.
        Returns:
        the codec to use; never null.
        Throws:
        CodecNotFoundException - if a suitable codec cannot be found.

      • fields

        @NonNull
Set<Field> fields()
        Returns all the fields in this mapping.
        Returns:
        the fields in this mapping.

      • variables

        @NonNull
Set<CQLWord> variables()
        Returns all the variables in this mapping.
        Returns:
        the variables in this mapping.
